00130             function                store_file_exists_info( $OriginalFilePath , $ExistsFlag )
00131             {
00132                   try
00133                   {
00134                         if( $ExistsFlag !== false )
00135                         {
00136                               return( true );
00137                         }
00138                         else
00139                         {
00140                               $this->Cache->add_data( $OriginalFilePath , '_file_was_not_found' );
00141                               return( false );
00142                         }
00143                   }
00144                   catch( Exception $e )
00145                   {
00146                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00172             function                file_exists( $OriginalFilePath )
00173             {
00174                   try
00175                   {
00176                         $OriginalFilePath = str_replace( '/./' , '/' , $OriginalFilePath );
00177                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( $OriginalFilePath );
00178                         
00179                         if( $Data === false )
00180                         {
00181                               return( $this->store_file_exists_info( $OriginalFilePath , file_exists( $OriginalFilePath ) ) );
00182                         }
00183                         else
00184                         {
00185                               return( $Data == '_file_was_not_found' ? false : true );
00186                         }
00187                   }
00188                   catch( Exception $e )
00189                   {
00190                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00191                   }
00192             }

00216             function                file_get_contents( $OriginalFilePath )
00217             {
00218                   try
00219                   {
00220                         $OriginalFilePath = str_replace( '/./' , '/' , $OriginalFilePath );
00221                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( $OriginalFilePath );
00222                         if( $Data !== false )
00223                         {
00224                               return( $Data );
00225                         }
00226                         else
00227                         {
00228                               $Data = @file_get_contents( $OriginalFilePath );
00229                               if( $Data !== false )
00230                               {
00231                                     $this->Cache->add_data( $OriginalFilePath , $Data );
00232                                     return( $Data );
00233                               }
00234                               else
00235                               {
00236                                     throw( new Exception( "File $OriginalFilePath was not found" ) );
00237                               }
00238                         }
00239                   }
00240                   catch( Exception $e )
00241                   {
00242                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00243                   }
00244             }

00268             function                file_put_contents( $OriginalFilePath , $Data )
00269             {
00270                   try
00271                   {
00272                         $OriginalFilePath = str_replace( '/./' , '/' , $OriginalFilePath );
00273                         if( $this->Cache->data_exists( $OriginalFilePath ) )
00274                         {
00275                               $this->Cache->set_data( $OriginalFilePath , $Data );
00276                         }
00277                         else
00278                         {
00279                               $this->Cache->add_data( $OriginalFilePath , $Data );
00280                         }
00281                         
00282                         @file_put_contents( $OriginalFilePath , $Data );
00283                   }
00284                   catch( Exception $e )
00285                   {
00286                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00287                   }
00288             }
